about-me.title: About Me
about-me.desc1: Hi, im Amirhossein — a frontend developer from Iran, passionate about building clean, fast, and user-friendly web experiences. I enjoy turning ideas into real interfaces using modern web technologies.
about-me.desc2: I focus on writing efficient code, improving UI interactions, and always learning new tools to grow as a developer. I love collaborating with creative people and bringing high-quality projects to life.
